```{r setup, include=FALSE}
pacman::p_load(
  flexdashboard, shiny, dplyr, arrow, 
  here, echarts4r, shinyWidgets
)

import <- function(path) read_feather(here('data', 'clean', path))

brics <- import('brics.feather')
indicators <- import('indicators.feather')
wdi <- import('wdi.feather')
un <- import('un.feather')

countries <- brics |> filter(iso2c != 'IN') |> pull(iso2c)
```

Sidebar {.sidebar}
=====================================

```{r}
selectInput(
  inputId="countries", 
  label = "Select another country:", 
  choices = countries, 
  selected = countries[1]
)
```

Economic indicators
=======================================================================

Column
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Inflation, consumer prices (ten year % average) {.value-box}

```{r}
renderValueBox({
  inf <- wdi |> 
    filter(iso2c == input$countries) |> 
    filter(year >= 2010 & year <= 2020) |> 
    summarise(mean_inflation = round(mean(inflation), 2))
  valueBox(
    value = inf,
    icon = "fa-area-chart",
    color = 'warning'
  )
})
```
